title: BBC Local Live: Northamptonshire for Wednesday 23 September 2015 - BBC News
summary: an earthquake , with a magnitude of 2.8 , has been felt in the north of northamptonshire .
a hotline targeting people who fail to follow rules about putting out rubbish in northampton is working , says the council .
news , sport , travel and weather updates resume at 08:00 on thursday .

documents.title: our live coverage through the day
text: local live has finished for today , but it 'll be back tomorrow from 08:00 with all the latest news , weather , sport and travel for northamptonshire .

documents.title: saints reveal new away shirt
text: northampton saints have launched their new away shirt for the 2015-16 season

documents.title: northampton chronicle & echo : market square fountain to remain on despite foam prank
text: northampton borough council has said another prank that saw the market square fountain spill over with foam will not see it shut off early .

documents.title: men robbed convenience store with meat cleaver
text: police have released cctv images in a bid to trace two men following a robbery at the one stop shop on swinburne road , wellingborough , between 11:35 and 11:45 on sunday .
during the incident , one of the men entered the store and threatened staff with a meat cleaver , forcing the staff to empty money from the tills into a black bag .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: northants herald & post : x factor contestant says 'stick with me northampton '
text: x factor contestant jamie benkert paid tribute to his hometown of northampton after passing the first boot camp challenge with a group performance of 'what a wonderful world ' .

documents.title: delapre abbey restorer 'shocked ' at the state of billiard room
text: i 've been to delapre abbey today to see the progress of the £ 6.3m restoration work taking place there .
mark parry from parish joinery told me he was `` shocked '' by the state of the billiard room , but added that some original features , such as a billiard cue , have been found .
author: Stuart Ratcliffe
BBC Look East

documents.title: headlines : kettering man walks free after 'serious paperwork defect ' work continues on delapre abbey
text: if you are catching up
author: Laura Cook
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: one of northampton busiest roads set for £ 2.7m roadworks
text: work due to start in october on mereway , northampton , will help improve traffic safety and vehicle flow on the town 's ring-road , including access to the wootton hall site , according to northamptonshire county council .
the scheme will cost £ 2.7m and is scheduled for completion by late march .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: weather : cloud this evening , rain later
text: there will be a few clear spells at first , with cloud levels increasing and the chance of some light , patchy rain in the evening .
lows of 11c ( 52f ) .
there will be sunny spells through the morning tomorrow , with a few scattered , blustery showers during the afternoon .
highs around 17c ( 63f ) .
author: Chris Bell
BBC Look East weather presenter

documents.title: northamptonshire telegraph : ruptured gas pipe catches fire on wellingborough building site
text: a road has been closed while emergency services deal with a damaged gas main which caught fire on a building site .

documents.title: uncle of missing mani dad suffered 'injustice , ' says judge
text: a judge has said mohammed chaudhry , from kettering , who was arrested following the disappearance of his nephew mani dad has suffered a `` great deal of injustice '' .

mani 's mother , leyla dad , had complained mr chaudhry , brother of mani 's father zayn dean , had not revealed all he knew about the seven-year-old 's disappearance , but mr justice holman said family court rules required a jail warning to be `` prominently displayed on the front '' of any papers , which had not happened in this case .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: northampton chronicle & echo : more than half of people at a & e tried to get treatment elsewhere first
text: the majority of emergency patients interviewed by a northamptonshire health watchdog had already tried to get medical help elsewhere .

documents.title: northamptonshire achieves its 20m steps
text: northamptonshire residents took more than 27m steps at the weekend as they chased down a county council challenge to collectively walk 20m steps .
that amount is 3m more than last years number , with the figure still increasing as people log their steps .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: surrey reach 268-6 against northamptonshire
text: it 's tea at the oval in northamptonshire final county championship match of the season , with rob keogh having dismissed surrey batsman kumar sangakkara for 101 just before the interval .
there is full commentary online .
tea : middle session finished and surrey are 268-6 ( 64 ) keogh 2-88 , white 2-51 .
sangakkara 101 ( 140 balls 13x4 1x6 ) .
# norvsur
author: Alex Winter
BBC Radio Northampton sport

documents.title: kettering man accused over nephew 's abduction free due to court papers 'defect '
text: a salesman accused of assisting in the abduction of his seven-year-old nephew has walked free after a judge concluded there was a `` serious defect '' in family court paperwork served on him by police .

mohammed chaudhry , of kettering was arrested following the disappearance of mani dad , but mr justice holman has `` struck out '' the application of leyla dad , mani 's mother , for mr chaudhry to be committed to prison for contempt of court .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: error means corby rents will taken early
text: corby borough council has said that `` due to an error that can not be rectified '' direct debits for rents due next week will be taken out of accounts tomorrow .
the council says any bank charges incurred by residents due to the error will be reimbursed .
author: Martin Borley
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: daventry 's teachers and students to get own awards ceremony
text: a new award scheme celebrating the achievements of pupils and teachers in daventry has been launched as part of the town 's 'festival of education ' .
it 's being organised as part of the 'daventry schools matter ' campaign , with an awards ceremony at the icon innovation centre next month .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: sunrise over northampton 'lunatic asylum '
text: photographer jamie cooper took this photo this morning over duston on the autumnal equinox .
it captures the derelict clock tower at st crispin 's hospital - an old `` lunatic asylum '' .
if you have a photo to share then you can email us or tweet us
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: afternoon headlines : bins hotline 'working ' ten-year-old wins spirit of corby award
text: here 's what we are looking at :
author: Carroll Weston
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: today 's big overstone hall
text: the main image on today 's page is of overstone hall .
last week it was announced as one of the top ten most at risk edwardian and victorian buildings in the uk .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: northamptonshire telegraph : desborough linesman set for 1,000th game
text: a desborough football official is set to run the line for the 1,000th time next week in the united counties league .

documents.title: spirit of corby awards ceremony takes place
text: the annual spirit of corby awards took place last night at the corby cube .
here 's a flavour of the evening and the winners
author: Martin Borley
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: weather : cloud this afternoon , rain possible
text: there will be some brightness around this afternoon , but it will be accompanied by cloud and possibly some showery rain .
maximum temperature of 16c ( 61f ) .
author: Georgina Burnett
BBC Weather

documents.title: northampton borough council leader : bins hotline 'is working '
text: mary markham , the leader of northampton borough council says its hotline for rubbish is working and it 's not just about shopping your neighbours
author: BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: northamptonshire take three wickets in morning session
text: northamptonshire have had a decent morning at the oval with some signs of turn for spinner graeme white .
it 's the last game of the season and there is full commentary online .
wicket : white gets foakes on the stroke of lunch !
he is bowled for 16 .
surrey are 108-3 ( 27.4 ) at lunch .
chambers 2-21 , white 1-1 .
# norvsur
author: Alex Winter
BBC Radio Northampton sport

documents.title: spirit of corby winner is 10-year-old boy
text: this year 's overall 'spirit of corby ' award has been won by 10-year-old liam duncan , who raised £ 3,000 for the cancer care unit at kettering general hospital by holding a fundraising day and cake stall at his school .
his mother , catherine , was treated for bowel cancer at the hospital , but died earlier this year .
author: Martin Borley
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: headlines : bins hotline 'working ' 10-year-old win spirit of corby award
text: here are our top stories :
author: BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: former lib dem leader says they 'could win seats ' in northamptonshire
text: ahead of new liberal democrat tim farron making his address to the party 's conference in bournemouth , former leader of the party sir menzies campbell told me that they could win seats in northamptonshire at the next general election .
there are no 'no go ' areas for the liberal democrats . ''
author: Stuart Linnell
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: will all the rubbish put out today in northampton be collected ?
text: i 've been in semilong in northampton where it 's bin day , but the black bags in this wo n't be collected .

they may even get reported on the hotline set up by in july by northampton borough council which has received 241 calls about people breaking the rules regarding what it calls the `` over-presentation of sacks '' .
author: Tom Percival
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: happy birthday to northampton town manager chris wilder
text: cobblers boss chris wilder turns 48 today .
not only is he northampton town manager , be played for the cobblers in 1998 once .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

text: northamptonshire highways have told katie they will correct the mistake , but if you spot a sign in northamptonshire that might not be quite correct then email us or tweet us .

documents.title: daventry express : daventry council looks at potential impact of refugees
text: daventry district council is looking at the potential local impact of the government 's policy on the refugee crisis in europe .

documents.title: cricketers get final game of the season underway
text: northamptonshire are at the oval to face surrey in their final game of the season .
there was no play yesterday because of rain , but the weather looks much better today .
northamptonshire are bowling and i have full commentary online .
author: Alex Winter
BBC Radio Northampton sport

documents.title: double rainbow in northamptonshire last night
text: i snapped this at yardley hastings on my way home last night .
if you have a to share then email us , or tweet us .
author: Anna Bartlett
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: 'no explanation ' for last night 's earthquake
text: a sesismologist with the british geological survey ( bgs ) has said he can not explain what caused the earthquake felt in north northamptonshire last night .
the e was near the town of oakham in rutland , and this is the fifth earthquake to hit the area this year .
bgs seismologist paul denton said it was unusual to have so many in one area .

documents.title: kettering to corby line reopened
text: the kettering to corby line , closed earlier due to a signal fault , has reopened
# emtupdate the line between kettering-corby will be reopened shortly 10:01 st.pancras to corby will be the first service to run # corby

documents.title: farmers helped to diversify to make money
text: northamptonshire 's farmers are being encouraged to find new ways of making money from their land with the support of the country land and business association .
a series of events are being held to show landowners what they could do , with new lodge farm in bulwick hosting one of the seminars next month .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: northampton chronicle & echo : superhero social media campaign goes worldwide
text: a social media campaign by a northamptonshire police officer to raise awareness of child sexual exploitation has gone global .

documents.title: council bad bin bag hotline results in 3,000 warning notices
text: three thousand warning notices have been issued by northampton borough council since the launch of a crackdown by the authority - 30 of which are being investigated after being upgraded to second level warnings .
residents are allowed to put out two bags of general waste , but these must be in the green sacks provided .
the council launched a bin bag hotline in july after complaints some streets were a mess and householders were n't following the rules .

documents.title: morning headlines : earthquake felt in northants bins hotline 'working '
text: morning headlines : earthquake felt in northants bins hotline 'working '
author: Andrew Radd
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: earthquake felt in north northamptonshire 'very shallow '
text: last night 's 2.8 magnitude earthquake , which was felt in north northamptonshire , had it 's e in rutland , where there has been four tremors already this year - the largest coming in january with a magnitude of 3.8 .
british geological survey seismologist paul denton , who lives in rutland himself , said : `` it was a very , very shallow earthquake , so it only happened about 2km under the ground . ''
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: your yesterday evening 's pitsford skyline
text: justine williams sent us this of pitsford from yesterday evening saying `` you ca n't beat a dramatic skyline '' .
if you have a to share then email us , or tweet us .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: problems with trains between corby and kettering
text: # emtupdate there is a loss of signalling between kettering-corby , the line is closed and our trains are unable to run .
# emtupdate a half hourly bus service will be in place from 0930 for customers between kettering-corby .

documents.title: earthquake felt like 'several hgvs '
text: an earthquake with a magnitude of 2.8 hit the north of northamptonshire last night .
the e was near oakham , but it was felt in places such as cottingham
there was a very firm rattle equivalent to several heavy goods vehicles going past the house at the same time . ''
if you felt the earthquake then you can email us or tweet us .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: travel : a14 disruption eastbound
text: there are delays on the a14 eastbound between j1 for welford and j2 for kelmarsh due to a broken down lorry .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: earthquake shakes northamptonshire
text: tremors from an earthquake with a magnitude of 2.8 have been felt in the north of the county .
the british geological survey has confirmed the e near the town of oakham in rutland , over the border in the east midlands .
it hit at 22:40 last night .
author: Craig Lewis
BBC News

documents.title: early headlines : 3,000 bin warnings in northampton farmers encouraged to diversify
text: here are our top stories :
author: Andrew Radd
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: rutland earthquake : did the earth move for you ?
text: the british geological survey has confirmed an earthquake with a magnitude of 2.8 hit rutland last night at 22.40 , centering on oakham .
another earthquake round our way last night .
i felt it at the time and thought it was unusually powerful for a hgv rumbling past
@ twitterid are sure it was not samantha cameron finding out why dave calls her babe ?
# earthquake
@ twitterid for real ?
here in chile is up 8.0 earthquake , 3.0 is just a small movement
@ twitterid same in oundle
@ twitterid yes felt the earthquake last night in cottingham ! !
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: weather : sunny for most of day , some drizzle later
text: after a bright , chilly start we will see plenty of sunshine this morning .
through the afternoon it will become cloudy with rain or drizzle .
top temperature : 16c ( 61f ) .
you can see my full forecast on the bbc look east facebook page .
author: Georgina Burnett
BBC Weather

documents.title: good morning and welcome to local live for northamptonshire
text: between now and 18:00 we 'll be bring you the latest news , weather , sport and travel for northamptonshire from the bbc newsroom in northampton .
if you have something to tell then email me , tweet us or head to facebook .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live
